replies.body:
Yasu-NOOO!!!

I remember pulling a pre-update Galio with my Blitzcrank skills, because "I was helping". I also remember crying myself to sleep that night on the sofa; couldn't even face the wife with my shame.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/228/734/Jarvan.jpg
jarman is just taking a nice cold shower with his{{item:3194}}  on.
Man that's one sweet hairnet you got their.
This is so old
And yet so gold :3
This is so old that half of players don't get it because they never seen an Anivia player, also having both J4 and bird for this makes it even less chances.
I'd also take in account that there are more champions that can just pass through J4 ult xD
Im just being downer

There is only one way to read that Galio line
http://www.worldatlas.com/upload/be/c9/af/theodore-roosevelt-laughing.jpg
This is great lmao
everytime i see a brand "support" its #1 lmao
It's how I play Velkoz too.
You... You make me depressed.

oof how can you guys play that role? There was this Rakan game I played where I had to peel the fuck out of my Vayne from like 3 divers on the enemy team. In the last teamfight, I used every ability and item active perfectly and because of that we won the game. in the post game lobby Vayne got all the honors. its just a bad feeling since if I wasnt there, and instead there was some inexperenced person who was autofilled in my place, we easily wouldve lost. and its not like she was a godly Vayne or anything. She was mediocre at best. Knew how to aa, which is all I need.
Yeah I know that feel. If I'm ADC and I carried and the support enabled some great plays early game, hell yeah I'm honoring and thanking and motivating that supp.

The life of a Sup Main. LoL. I love it.  +1.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

I'm a supp main that likes to do dumb stuff like Kindred adc and Nidalee support... Maybe Nidalee should be added in this haha...
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}

No2 4 life. 
'You fine right fam? We just killed the support and jungler and are grabbing drag/deep warding/getting mid. You just need to farm safely and not die to the 0-2-1 Lucian"
#AnAllyHasBeenSlain

I'm so guilty of 3

Especially so when I play with my adc main friend and he plays a role other than adc for a change
I still end up following him around the map because it's such a habit.

Haha, I've ended up doing that to, my friend started playing mid lane and it seemed I kinda just ended up mid with her every 5 seconds, or if she was travelling guess who was traveling to lmao. My poor adc's...

followed by "omg report noob support leaving and jungler doesn't gank, no wards, I'm god bow before me"

right?

{{champion:37}} : {{item:3070}} {{item:3165}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3020}} 
{{sticker:sg-syndra}}
You also make me sad.
As an avid off meta support player you left most of my roster out of that collage. Also I'd like an adc that understands wave control. Can I get that for Christmas?
You shouldn't be able to sign as adc before you have watched at least 5 hours of youtub vids on lane control. Im an idiot scrub who mains support, and even I did that.
It would be better if the tutorial actually explained some of that.
You could argue the point that Riot ought to make a tutorial explaining minions and wave management, as it is a pretty important part of the game in general, yes :)

Had a great game earlier playing  {{champion:202}} 

With a {{champion:59}}  support, j4s ult made mine much easier lol

When No.5 happens I tell my ADC, "Don't worry, I'm a support main."

Not sure if it helps though...
I'm guilty of doing 2 often.
That Lulu is me when I play Braum with my friends

{{champion:163}} support sometimes works. I've been in that role.

{{champion:163}}
Im ussualy 3rd :/
If only

2.Is the one I run into the most when playing support. Mostly because my jungler will be ass and I can see a bunch of easily gankable lanes with people just waving their asses in thee air screaming,

"OH, look at how vulnerable I am!"

Go mid, get them a kill, 
Heading top
See enemy jungler getting scuddle
Fuck with them for about 30 secs
Force top to back
Then come back to bot just in time to see our tower die.
Not gonna lie I'm a lot like #3
I wont flame you for missing farm <3

1 every time I pick lux
3 anytime I support
5 me until I hit level 17
Support role sucks. If your team sucks and you go 'actual' support champ, you can't carry in their place. Better to go carry champ.
